n.u: On The Case With Paula Zahn

p.n: On The Case With Paula Zahn IX (1)
p.k: 73% Terror in Waupaca Outrage sweeps across the state of Wisconsin when a 12-year-old girl is abducted while playing outside her grandmother's house
After martial arts enthusiast Carl Hunt suffers a fatal knife wound to the gut, Lt Joe Kenda discovers a cache of blood evidence that leads him to the killer
Magic Bullet When a father is shot in the head just steps from a strip club, Lt Joe Kenda uncovers a conspiracy organised by an unlikely gunman
81% Cruel Summer When gunmen open fire on a porch in New Orleans - shooting four children and three adults - detective Tim Bender turns to the community for clues
81% Knock Knock In Tulsa, a man from out of town is found dead in his motel room and detective Michael Zenoni must wade through a web of secrets
Triple Threat When a California mother-of-two is found strangled in her home, detectives question whether she was the latest victim of a fledgling serial killer
Keep Friends Close, Enemies Closer Detectives investigate a fatal acid attack, uncovering a deadly neighbourhood feud and a manipulative mastermind with a horrific plan
Ipswich Lorraine Thorpe hit headlines as Britain's youngest female double-killer. But more deaths were about to rock the Suffolk town. Katherine Kelly explores

p.n: What The Killer Did Next I (8)
p.k: Kate Prout A look into the 2007 murder of farmer's wife Kate Prout in Gloucestershire. Having failed to find her body, police wondered if the truth would ever be revealed
Struggle in the Night Documentary digging into the death of Michigan mum Lisa Fein, whose body was found buried in a shallow grave near her home
New. Colorado Springs police detective Joseph Kenda investigates another brutal homicide
The Master Key When a pregnant mother and her young sons are brutally murdered, pressure mounts on Lt Joe Kenda and the CSPD to catch the monster who did it

n.u: On The Case with Paula Zahn

p.n: On The Case with Paula Zahn VIII (1)
p.k: 73% A Stranger Among Us A teenager's disappearance during a visit to her hometown marks the beginning of a terrifying 30-year mystery
Co-Ed Killer Police attempt to track down a serial killer when young, female students disappear with alarming frequency from the college town of Santa Cruz, California
Christmas Eve Massacre Police are alerted when a man dressed as Santa turns up to a family Christmas Eve party carrying a handgun and a gift-wrapped flamethrower
